Dismembered Arm.Effect: The Dismembered Arm is gone. You drop any items in that dismembered arm's hand immediately. Base Death Save Penalty is increased by 1.

Dismembered Hand.Effect: The Dismembered Hand is gone. You drop any items in the dismembered hand immediately. Base Death Save Penalty is increased by 1.

Collapsed Lung.Effect: -2 to MOVE (minimum 1). Base Death Save Penalty is increased by 1.

Broken Ribs.Effect: At the end of every Turn where you move further than 4m/yds on foot, you re-suffer this Critical Injury's Bonus Damage directly to your Hit Points.

Broken Arm.Effect: The Broken Arm cannot be used. You drop any items in that arm's hand immediately.

Foreign Object.Effect: At the end of every Turn where you move further than 4m/yds on foot, you re-suffer this Critical Injury's Bonus Damage directly to your Hit Points. Quick Fix removes Injury Effect permanently.
Foreign Object.Treatment: Quick Fix removes Injury Effect permanently

Broken Leg.Treatment: Paramedic DV13, Paramedic DV15 or Surgery DV13

Torn Muscle.Effect: -2 to Melee Attacks. Quick Fix removes Injury Effect permanently.
Torn Muscle.Treatment: Quick Fix removes Injury Effect permanently

Spinal Injury.Effect: Next Turn, you cannot take an Action, but you can still take a Move Action. Base Death Save Penalty is increased by 1.

Crushed Fingers.Effect: -4 to all Actions involving that hand.

Dismembered Leg.Effect: The Dismembered Leg is gone. -6 to MOVE (minimum 1). You cannot dodge attacks. Base Death Save Penalty is increased by 1.
